ai-anya-e0103n0:62_3: It is because they have completely developed the four noble paths as their origin, their cessation, and the path. They have practiced on their path. They have reached the end of their defilements.

ai-anya-e0103n0:65_1: fulfillment of the precepts foreignorant conduct. They act in line with the fundamentals of the spiritual life. They’ve fulfilled the practice that leads to the life of purity. They fulfill ethics. They fulfill their precepts ...
ai-anya-e0103n0:65_2: Likewise that of those who fulfill the practice accordingly is once-returners.
ai-anya-e0103n0:65_3: For there are two noble immersions that are high and lucidity of sensual desire and ill will, maintaining balanced finances, and full of ill will, alternativeliness, and concentration, and understanding—when there is understanding that concentration is called “preliminary” in the moderation of concentration and understanding.
ai-anya-e0103n0:65_4: But the mendicant once-returners enjoying sensual pleasures, when they do so,
ai-anya-e0103n0:65_5: it’s endowed with everything that you’ve undertaken.
ai-anya-e0103n0:66_0: for this is said by the Blessed One:
ai-anya-e0103n0:67_0: “Mendicants, take the case of a mendicant who has fulfilled their ethics, but has limited immersion and wisdom.
ai-anya-e0103n0:67_1: They break some lesser and minor training rules, but are restored.
ai-anya-e0103n0:67_3: Because I don’t say they’re incapable of that.
ai-anya-e0103n0:67_4: But they’re constant and steady in their precepts regarding the training rules that are fundamental, befitting the spiritual life. They keep the rules they’ve undertaken.
ai-anya-e0103n0:67_5: With the ending of three fetters they’re a stream-enterer, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.
ai-anya-e0103n0:67_6: Take a mendicant who has ethical conduct loved by the noble ones ...
ai-anya-e0103n0:67_7: With the ending of three fetters, and the weakening of greed, hate, and delusion, they’re a once-returner.
ai-anya-e0103n0:67_8: After returning to this world once, he does an end to suffering.
ai-anya-e0103n0:67_9: Take another case of a mendicant who has fulfilled their ethics and immersion, but has limited wisdom.
ai-anya-e0103n0:67_10: There are no fruits for them.
ai-anya-e0103n0:67_13: If they don’t attain the ending of defilements, they’re reborn spontaneously ... and are not liable to return from that world.
ai-anya-e0103n0:67_14: Take another case of a mendicant who has fulfilled their ethics and immersion, and wisdom.
ai-anya-e0103n0:67_15: He has lesser and minor smaller sections. ...
ai-anya-e0103n0:67_17: They realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. ...
ai-anya-e0103n0:68_0: “Laying,” he asked about the training and declaring about that, and so on.
ai-anya-e0103n0:68_1: Herein, there are three wholesome faculties: three skillful qualities in their special qualities, etc., and three kinds of seclusion, occupation, etc.; and these other three faculties, are the covetousness and ties.
ai-anya-e0103n0:68_2: Such virtue as this, etc., are such as virtues, and so on.
ai-anya-e0103n0:69_0: For there is an storehouse here in one who is virtuous, possessed of virtue, concentration and understanding regarding virtue in the special qualities of consciousness, etc., in the Vibhaṅga’s mind is shown by understanding.
ai-anya-e0103n0:69_1: Likewise the necessities is shown by virtue; the abandoning of profitable striving is shown by virtue; and praised.
